venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Our next Boston BizSpark Meetup will be held on Thursday, September 8th at Microsoft NERD on the 11th floor located at One Memorial Drive in Cambridge. This is an easy eastbound walk from Kendall Square Red Line T stop. There is also free parking in front of the building and paid parking in the basement garage entrance on the west side of the building.

At 6:30 PM Marsh Sutherland (that's me) from SocialGrow  will speak on 7 Free Ways to Build Buzz for startups.  Metrics don't lie and we've already built our Twitter following to 46K+ and built name recognition for SocialGrow before even marketing our app.

At 7:00 PM David Fogel of Swifton CFOs will speak on Startup Financial Projections for Angel Investment. He's a cool funny cat.  You'll like him and learn a lot.

At 7:30 PM Mina Hsiang with General Catalyst , Bill McCullen with Launch Capital, and Kyle Fugere with Tollman Capital Partners will hear pitches from Mobiflex by George Adams and from ShopLoaf / Main & Me by James Akers. 

Please RSVP and bring guests. We're always open to suggestions for topics for experts to speak on as well.

Microsoft Cambridge will be generously providing pizza and drinks as always!

-Marsh Sutherland  
Boston BizSpark Meetup Organizer
item.name: 7 Ways to Build Buzz & Financials Proj. for Angel Inv | Startup Pitches to 3 VCs
